text: The 2004 movie Catwoman starring Halle Berry and Sharon Stone was a huge box office flop. But Berry said Monday night at the Matrix Awards that she doesn't regret making it because she earned'a s * * * load of money'from it. The actress, 51, said the money she got for playing the DC Comics character changed her life and also taught her some valuable lessons.
